org.svvrl.goal.core.layout
Interface CostFunction

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractCostFunction, KKCostFunction, SACostFunction
public interface CostFunction

A cost function is capable of incrementally calculating the cost to be minimized for drawing a graph in a better layout. This is used by the SA layout

Author:
Ming-Hsien Tsai

Method Summary

          Returns the name of this cost function.

          Initializes this cost function and returns the initial cost of a specified graph.

          Sets the area available for the graph.
